snippet: Louisiana State University agreed Monday to hand over information about its presidential search to a state district judge, but not to the newspapers that sued for the records.
abstract: Louisiana State University agrees to hand over information about its presidential search to a state district judge, but not to the newspapers that sued for the records.
lead_paragraph: Louisiana State University agreed Monday to hand over information about its presidential search to a state district judge, but not to the newspapers that sued for the records.

headline.main: Louisiana: Judge Will Get College Search Documents
headline.print_headline: Louisiana: Judge Will Get College Search Documents
